text: Dame Calliopa Pearlette Louisy (born 8 June 1946) is a Saint Lucian politician. She was the Governor-General of Saint Lucia from 1997 until 2017. She was the first woman to hold this office. ==References== Category:1946 births Category:Living people Category:Governors-General of Saint Lucia Category:Alumni of the University of Bristol Category:University of the West Indies alumni
title: Pearlette Louisy
